title:billam-europa
description:Europa weapons

// Bonechiller - god-pvp (god-pvp)
//notes: bonechiller is VERY slept on. it's often dismissed for its low handling and lack of quickdraw, but it boasts solid range and a ridiculous 61 aim assist, which is close to double the AA of all other energy slugs. in addition, you can stack firmly planted and opening shot for an even more ridiculous boost to accuracy. honestly, quick charge + quick access sling makes pretty much any shotgun's ready speed fast - you're not giving up too much there, either.
recommended mw: handling or range tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=1840239774,791862061,280464955,47981717
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=1840239774,791862061,280464955,4071163871
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=1840239774,3142289711,280464955,47981717
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=1840239774,3142289711,280464955,4071163871
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=3250034553,791862061,280464955,47981717
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=3250034553,791862061,280464955,4071163871
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=3250034553,3142289711,280464955,47981717
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=3250034553,3142289711,280464955,4071163871


// Bonechiller - god-pve (god-pve)
//notes: bonechiller leaves much to be desired in pve. it has great left column perks, but its only damage perk is one for all, which isn't very practical on a shotgun. you're better off with a sojourner's tale or first in last out.
recommended mw: reload (unless autoloading) or handling tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=1840239774,791862061,1556840489,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=1840239774,791862061,1556840489,3523296417
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=1840239774,791862061,3300816228,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=1840239774,791862061,3300816228,3523296417
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=3250034553,791862061,1556840489,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=3250034553,791862061,1556840489,3523296417
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=3250034553,791862061,3300816228,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=3250034553,791862061,3300816228,3523296417


// Bonechiller - pvp (pvp)
//notes: bonechiller is VERY slept on. it's often dismissed for its low handling and lack of quickdraw, but it boasts solid range and a ridiculous 61 aim assist, which is close to double the AA of all other energy slugs. in addition, you can stack firmly planted and opening shot for an even more ridiculous boost to accuracy. honestly, quick charge + quick access sling makes pretty much any shotgun's ready speed fast - you're not giving up too much there, either.
recommended mw: handling or range tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=839105230,791862061,280464955,47981717
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=839105230,791862061,280464955,4071163871
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=839105230,791862061,280464955,3523296417

dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=839105230,791862061,3436462433,4071163871
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=839105230,791862061,3436462433,3523296417
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=839105230,3142289711,280464955,47981717
dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=839105230,3142289711,280464955,4071163871

dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=839105230,679225683,3436462433,47981717

dimwishlist:item=4037745684&perks=839105230,679225683,3436462433,3523296417

// Bonechiller - pve (pve)
//notes: bonechiller leaves much to be desired in pve. it has great left column perks, but its only damage perk is one for all, which isn't very practical on a shotgun. you're better off with a sojourner's tale or first in last out.
recommended mw: reload (unless autoloading) or handling tags:pve
